source_name: Life Cycle Inventory Analysis for a Small-Scale Trawl Fishery in Sendai Bay, Japan
source_documentation: Low confidence in gear intensity report

effort_models.name: Fuel Economy - Sendai Bay small scale trawl
effort_models.documentation: Fuel economy as proxy for engine size - 322000 L fuel over 212 t catch. * 35 MJ/L * 1 kWh/3.6MJ * 0.40 = 5900 kW*h per tonne of catch

effort_models.name: Fishing Days by vessel size - Sendai Bay small scale trawl
effort_models.documentation: 7-9 tonne vessels; 230-270 kg per day; Section 3.1 and Figure 3

gear_models.name: small scale bottom trawl - Sendai Bay
gear_models.documentation: Watanabe 2016 [DOI 10.3390/su8040399] Figure 4 - 1667 kg of net per 0.33 vessels, over tonnage 7.3-9.7 GT
